The Gamdias KRATOS P2-850G 850W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply offers optimal energy use while maintaining consistent power delivery. It complies with ATX12V v3.0 standards and boasts an 80 PLUS Gold efficiency rating. With an APFC that has a PF value of 0.99, it improves efficiency by power factor adjustment. It enables programmable lighting effects and has a 5V 3-pin Addressable RGB header that supports motherboard sync. Its 140 x 150 x 86 mm dimensions let it to fit well within standard ATX cases. To save energy when not in use, it supports C6 and C7 power states. Its broad AC input range of 11-5.5A / 47-63Hz / 100-240V~ makes it suitable for use worldwide. The DC output has the following values: +3.3V, +5V, +12V, -12V, and +5Vsb; the maximum output currents for each are indicated. With a total power output rated at 850W and a peak power of 1105W, the Gamdias KRATOS P2-850G 850W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply offers enough power for demanding installations. Complete protection is provided by OVP, UVP, OPP, SCP, OCP, and OTP. With its flat cables and modular design, the power supply facilitates simple installation and cable management. Reliability and durability are ensured by using only Japanese capacitors. The Gamdias KRATOS P2-850G 850W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply offers effective cooling as well as visual appeal with its 30 Neon-Flex RGB lighting effects and 120mm hydraulic bearing fan. By using LLC resonant circuit design and comprehensive DC-DC circuit design, it maximizes power delivery and stability. It emphasizes energy efficiency and complies with ErP Lot 6 environmental requirements.

full_description:
Gamdias KRATOS P2-1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply

The Gamdias KRATOS P2-1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply is 80 Plus Gold certified, ensuring a consistent and efficient power supply. Featuring compatibility with PCIe Gen 5.0 and ATX 3.0, a premium 120mm hydraulic bearing fan, 100% Japanese capacitors, and 30 integrated addressable lighting effects, this device is sure to impress in terms of both performance and design. The Gamdias KRATOS P2-1000G 1000W ATX 3.0 Power Supply, designed to satisfy 80 PLUS Gold certification requirements, ensures consistent power production with up to 90% efficiency at 50% load and 87% efficiency at 100% load. The Gamdias PSU is made to meet the power needs of next-generation graphics cards by providing up to 200% total power excursion, while also catering to ATX 3.0 standards and PCIe Gen 5.0 connector compatibility. The Gamdias KRATOS P2-1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply features 30 integrated lighting effects that are easily accessible with a simple button switch. It also supports addressable RGB sync using the sync software provided by the motherboard manufacturer. A 120mm hydraulic bearing fan is included with the Gamdias KRATOS P2-1000G 1000W Power Supply to enable superior heat dissipation during almost silent operation. The fan will reduce unwanted noise by adjusting its speed when in silent mode. Produced with only premium Japanese electrolytic capacitors at 105°C/221°F to guarantee standards for stability, longevity, and quality. Featuring a complete bridge LLC resonance aid, 12V synchronous rectification, and a superior DC-to-DC construction, this device produces an output that is both safe and steady. A 12+4-pin VGA power connector (12VHPWR) and up to four 6+2-pin VGA power connectors are supported in addition to NVIDIA and AMD graphics cards with higher power requirements and alternative connectors by the Gamdias KRATOS P2-1000G 1000W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply.

full_description:
Gamdias HELIOS P2-1300G 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply

The Gamdias HELIOS P2-1300G 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply is a fully modular next-generation power supply unit with 80 Plus Gold certification, ATX 3.0 and PCIe Gen 5.0 support, 100% highly reliable Japanese capacitors, and a 135mm dual-ball bearing fan for maximum stability, reliability, and performance. With a steady power output of up to 92% efficiency at 50% load and an 80 PLUS Gold level of design, this device lowers power consumption and its carbon footprint. With up to 200% total power excursion, the Gamdias HELIOS P2-1300G 1300W 80 Plus Gold Power Supply is engineered to meet ATX 3.0 standards and PCIe Gen 5.0 connection compatibility. Up to twice the overall power excursion and up to three times the GPU power excursion can be supported by the Gamdias ATX 3.0 Power Supply. For PCIe 5.0 graphics cards, the native 16 PIN (12VHPWR) PCIe connector can give up to 600W, offering strong and reliable performance and enabling the PSU to handle high-power GPUs natively. With a premium 135mm twin ball bearing fan that offers superior durability, acoustics, and thermal performance to extend the life of the PSU. In addition, the smart fan reduces unwanted noise and modifies the fan speed. The Gamdias HELIOS P2-1300G 1300W Power Supply has the best power stability and exceptional endurance thanks to 100% premium Japanese electrolytic capacitors rated at 105°C/221°F. Featuring a complete bridge LLC resonance aid, 12V synchronous rectification, and a superior DC-to-DC construction, this device produces an output that is both safe and steady. Designed to accommodate modern NVIDIA and AMD graphics cards with higher power requirements and distinct connectors, the Gamdias HELIOS P2-1300G 1300W 80 Plus Gold ATX 3.0 Power Supply can also accept up to four 6+2-pin VGA power connectors and a 12+4-pin VGA power connector (12VHPWR).
